Overview: This course covers advanced techniques for writing exploits and patching vulnerabilities, taught through an intense, hands-on security laboratory. A significant part of this course involves solvingCapture-The-Flag (CTF)and discussing strategies for solving such problems. This course covers a variety of topics including (but not limited to) reverse engineering, exploitation, binary analysis, and web.
Operating systems or equivalent (e.g., CS 3210 at GT).
Suggested Background Knowledge: Operating systems or equivalent (e.g., CS 3210 at GT).
